  • Cosmo.Parameter

Source code for Cosmo.Parameter

#
# Simple class for dealing with Parameter.
# Parameter has a name, a value, an error and some bounds
# Names are also latex names.



[docs]class Parameter:
    def __init__(self, name, value, err=0.0, bounds=None, Ltxname=None):
        self.name = name
        if Ltxname:
            self.Ltxname = Ltxname
        else:
            self.Ltxname = name
        self.value = value
        # this is the estimate of error
        self.error = err
        if bounds == None:
            self.bounds = (value-5*err, value+5*err)
        else:
            self.bounds = bounds



[docs]    def sameParam(self, param2):
        return self.name == param2.name




[docs]    def setLatexName(self, Ltx):
        self.Ltxname = Ltx




[docs]    def setValue(self, val):
        self.value = val




[docs]    def setError(self, err):
        self.error = err




[docs]    def setBounds(self, low, high):
        self.bounds = [low, high]
